alert.note: Alert for Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 06 at 2:55AM EST until January 07 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 3 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 5 and 8 inches. * WHERE...In Pennsylvania, Higher Elevations of Fayette County. In West Virginia, Marion, Monongalia, Preston and Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston Counties. * WHEN...From 3 PM this afternoon to 9 AM EST Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening and Friday morning commutes.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Marion; Monongalia; Preston; Ridges of Eastern Monongalia and Northwestern Preston
